using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;

namespace AnotherECS.Gen.Common
{
    public static class CommonLayoutInstaller
    {
<#ARRAY [0..CALLER:COUNT]#>
        [MethodImpl(MethodImplOptions.AggressiveInlining)]
        public static void Install_<#CALLER:TYPE_NAME#><TComponent>(State state<#IF COMPONENT_FUNCTION#>, ComponentFunction<TComponent> componentFunction<#END#>)
            where TComponent : unmanaged, IComponent<#GENERIC_CONSTRAINTS:TComponent#>
        {
            state.AddLayout<<#CALLER:DECLARE#>, TComponent>(<#IF COMPONENT_FUNCTION#>componentFunction<#END#>);
        }
<#END#>
    }
